about_the_game:
Unleash your inner detective in Dead Meat - a murder mystery interrogation game where you can ask the suspects literally anything, using voice or keyboard!

Dive into a macabre conspiracy of burgers and billionaires, getting up-close and personal with an eccentric cast of cold-blooded killers.

Want to discuss their alibi? Probe them on the meaning of life? Confess your love? Or just troll them mercilessly? Your words hold power, and anything goes. Persuade them, manipulate them, threaten them, or even charm them into spilling their secrets.

The Interrogation room is your sandbox, and your imagination is the only limit. What will you ask to get to the truth?

Features:

  • Interrogate 15+ eccentric suspects using voice or keyboard

  • Use mind-reading abilities to explore new leads and crack the case

  • Employ classic interrogation strategies, or invent wild, unorthodox approaches

  • Watch suspects respond emotionally to your tactics in real time

  • Piece together a macabre mega-conspiracy, connecting a cast of big bad billionaires

Every suspect has committed a murder, but it’s up to you to unravel the who, where, how, and why. But be warned, the deeper you go, the darker it gets… as moral compasses are flipped, and blood gets on your hands. 

Will you be the cunning detective who carefully unpicks the truth - or the chaos agent who takes their own path? The suspects are waiting, and the mic is yours.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 11 (Big Sur) or later (Intel or Apple Silicon)
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support -OR- Any Apple Silicon CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel, AMD or Apple Silicon GPU
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-bit)
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable GPU
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
